overview_of_class: Course describes the neuroaudiological and neuropsychological bases of, assessment of, and intervention for central auditory processing disorders (CAPDs) among children and adults. Topics include overview of peripheral and central auditory nervous system neuroanatomy and physiology, auditory neurodevelopment, formal and informal assessment tools, special considerations for testing, diagnostic test scoring and interpretation, screening, management strategies, remediation programs and techniques, service delivery options, and conveying diagnostic/intervention information to clients, families and caregivers.
name: Evaluation and Treatment of Central Auditory Processing Disorders
subject: CSD
